ai-tha-ap315:1.2_0: on the bank of the river Aciravatī,
ai-tha-ap315:1.3_0: having seen the sloth of my army,
ai-tha-ap315:2.3_0: longing for honey, they’re the ones of first,
ai-tha-ap315:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap315:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap315:3.4_0: this fruit is the perception of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap315:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable goal.
ai-tha-ap315:6.1_0: this third (whole), for the third Elder Nun Passī
